detectors.description: Pragma version^0.6.12 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PermittedAddresses.sol#1) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.11

detectors.description:
owner() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.owner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PermittedAddresses.sol#61-63)

renounceOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.renounceOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PermittedAddresses.sol#80-83)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PermittedAddresses.sol#89-93)

getType(address) should be declared external:
	- PermittedAddresses.getType(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PermittedAddresses.sol#184-186)
